Congressman Hurd: s resignation from the House Committee on Small Business was confirmed through a March 2015 entry in the Congressional Record, where Hurd requested to be removed from the committee in a letter to House Speaker John Boehner.
Hurd: s workload and committee assignments were also confirmed through his official House website, which provided information on his various committee roles and responsibilities.
The House clerk: s web page, dated February 10, 2015, listed Hurd as a member of the small business panel along with two other committees, namely the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, where he chairs the Information Technology Subcommittee, and the National Security Subcommittee.
